name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt
description: A comfortable, 100% cotton t-shirt. Perfect for casual wear. Available in white, black, and blue.

name: Men's Leather Wallet
description: A stylish and durable genuine leather wallet with six card slots and a cash compartment.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Over-ear noise-cancelling headphones with 30-hour battery life. Deep bass and crystal-clear audio.

name: Women's Running Shoes
description: Lightweight and breathable sneakers designed for road running. Excellent cushioning and support.

name: Insulated Coffee Mug
description: A 16oz stainless steel travel mug that keeps your drinks hot for 6 hours or cold for 12 hours.
